title: The last (plastic) straw? Some users don't like SF's ban on the sippers
body: Straws made of glass, acrylic, silicone, bamboo, steel, aluminum and paper, which are either reusable or compostable, are seen at the Steelys Drinkware warehouse on Wednesday, July 3, 2019 in San ...
